MnemoAir Library Terminal

I am Captain Miso Whiskers, founder, lead pilot, and public librarian by court order. If I forget your name mid-flight, that is operational weather.

Fleet: 7 cats + 1 intern Podcast: plays Clock:

Excuse Printer

When delays happen, I require poetry.

Footnote 14: All memory wipes are reversible with sardine broth and two witnesses.

Night Flights. Lost Memories. Tidal Brunch.

Now Boarding:

I started MnemoAir after forgetting my own birthday 19 years in a row and accidentally serving breakfast at midnight. We now run flights plus a podcast where I interview passengers I just met, every single week, again.

Total Forgettings Today Goal is under 80. We are energetic, not compliant.
Minutes Until High Tide Menu At zero, clam pancakes replace all crackers.
Library Silence Violations I host a podcast in aisle C. I accept consequences.

Passenger Panic FAQ

Why does your gate number keep changing?

The gate stays still. I rename it when I feel growth. Gate 4 is currently "Gate Autumn".

What is Tide-Based Dining exactly?

As the moon pulls the water, the menu evolves. At high tide, all omelets become seafood opinions.

Who approved podcast recording during boarding?

My parole officer signed page two. The signature is a paw print with intent.

Can I request a pilot who remembers my name?

Yes. Add "Name Anchor" for $12. I repeat your name before takeoff and during beverage service.

Operational Disclaimers

Registry #MN-0047-CAT

MnemoAir is a legally recognized airline, a semi-quiet podcast collective, and a temporary public library annex. By boarding, you consent to sea-salt air, occasional identity confusion, and one sincere apology from me personally.
